original_text: The command was to leave the base of the tree and its roots in the ground. This means that you will be king again later. But before that, you will have to understand that it is God in heaven who rules.
korean_text: 또 그들이 그 나무뿌리의 그루터기를 남겨 두라 하였은즉 하나님이 다스리시는 줄을 왕이 깨달은 후에야 왕의 나라가 견고하리이다

sentences.original_text: The command was to leave the base of the tree
and its roots in the ground.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 뿌리를 땅에 남겨두는 것이었습니다

sentences.original_text: This means that you will be king again later.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것은 당신이 나중에 다시 왕이 될 것임을 의미합니다

sentences.original_text: that it is God in heaven who rules.
